snippet: Nearly four months after his arrest in the disappearance of Hannah Graham, a University of Virginia student, a 33-year-old man has been indicted on a murder count in the case.
abstract: Jesse Matthew Jr is indicted in Virginia on first degree murder charges in disappearance of University of Virginia student Hannah Graham.
lead_paragraph: Nearly four months after his arrest in the disappearance of Hannah Graham, a University of Virginia student, a 33-year-old man has been indicted on a murder count in the case.

headline.main: Virginia: Man Held in Abduction Now Faces Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Man Held in Abduction Now Faces Murder Charge
